get.description: Generates RTE configured styles' CSS.

Gets all channels

__Security Roles Allowed:__ ORGANISATION_MANAGE_DOCUMENT_SIZES, PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS
Gets all RTE configurations

delete.description:
Replaced by DocumentResource#bulkDelete(GenericDocumentDeletionArgumentsDto)

Deletes instances by ids. The RESTful service, which is responsible for processing the async request, is stored in the HTTP header "Location". __Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

post.description:
Copy given instance

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_INSTANCE, PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

get.description:
Checks whether two instances are identical

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_INSTANCE, PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

Gets instance by id

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

delete.description:
Replaced by DocumentResource#delete(String)

Deletes instance by its id. __Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

409.description: Instance is used by other entities

post.description:
Validates instance by id and arguments.
By default, small validation is done, unless ValidateInstance.Parameters#CUSTOM_TYPE is specified, then a comprehensive is done. __Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

get.description:
Get dropdownvalues for instance with smartBlocks or smartPages. For an instance without them it returns an empty array.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

200.description: the found dropdownvalues by smartBlockIds or (and) smartPageIds

get.description:
Checks the result from the job by given job id.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the job to be checked

get.description:
Gets MaPS attachment(s) by given document id(s)

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Instances to get MaPS attachments for

patch.description:
Archives an online document

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_INSTANCE

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the id of the online document

patch.description:
Unarchives an instance

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_INSTANCE

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the id of the online document

get.description:
Downloads online document

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the online document

get.description:
Gets document preview

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the online document

parameters.description: If set to true, only the active output methods will be returned

parameters.description: If set to true, only the managed output methods will be returned

200.description: Object containing the output method data

Updates the corresponding output method. The position parameter is not updated by this method. If you want to change position - please use the "_move-to-position" end-point.

post.description:
Change position of the style.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ ORGANISATION_MANAGE_CELL_STYLES, ORGANISATION_MANAGE_CHARACTER_STYLES, ORGANISATION_MANAGE_PARAGRAPH_STYLES, ORGANISATION_MANAGE_TABLE_STYLES, PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

201.description: response if the style's position is change successful.

delete.description:
Delete a single editor style

__Security Roles Allowed:__ ORGANISATION_MANAGE_CELL_STYLES, ORGANISATION_MANAGE_CHARACTER_STYLES, ORGANISATION_MANAGE_PARAGRAPH_STYLES, ORGANISATION_MANAGE_TABLE_STYLES, PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

patch.description:
Archives a template

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_TEMPLATE

get.description:
Gets all boxes for a template

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

403.description: The user has no rights to access the template and its boxes

get.description: __Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

post.description:
Creates an instance based on a specific template. If the instance is created successfully, link to
Document Wizard is stored in the HTTP header "Location".

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_INSTANCE, PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the template, which will be used for the creation of the instance

get.description:
Gets template preview

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

put.description:
Captures HTML template preview and updates template accordingly

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: Delay in ms, between the moment when the page is fully loaded and the snapshot, default is 200ms

post.description:
Captures HTML template preview

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: Delay in ms, between the moment when the page is fully loaded and the snapshot, default is 200ms

get.description:
Gets all selected renderers for a template

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

403.description: The user has no rights to access the template and its renderers

post.description:
Bulk template deletions. "Location" header provides the url for task progress

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_DELETE_TEMPLATE, PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

207.description: The operation is accepted. You can check the progress at /wp/rest//templates/bulk/deletion-tasks/<task-key>

get.description:
Gets the statuses of all template deletion tasks

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

200.description: a collection of GenericTemplateDeletionTaskDto containing the statuses of each template deletion task

get.description:
Gets the status of a template deletion task by its key

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS
__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_DELETE_TEMPLATE, PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

200.description: object describing deletion of this template

post.description:
This method is used to send notifications related to workflow(steps)

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

get.description:
Gets templates which are recently created

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max count of the returned results

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the unit in which the dimensions of the templates will be calculated com.piConsult.piMedia.util.GraphicalUnit

post.description:
Creates a template by selected usage type. Returns response. If the template is created successfully, link to
Template Wizard Step 1 is stored in the HTTP header "Location". If the creation fails, an error message is stored
in the response body.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_TEMPLATE, PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

requestBody.description:
Contains the usage type of the template. If the selected usage type is equal to 0, an INDD template is
created. If the selected usage type is equal to 2, a HTML template is created.

201.description: Response with specified status and DTO.

delete.description:
Deletes templates by ids. The RESTful service, which is responsible for processing the async request, is stored
in the HTTP header "Location".

externalReferences.description:
External references are strict and weak. Strict external references are when template was used as a smart page
or smart layout in documents or in other modules. If template has strict external references, deletion is not
possible. Weak external references are when template is used in other templates (smart page). Template deletion
is allowed in case of weak external references.
